channel.title: Achmad Rahman Mawardi
channel.description: Recent content on Achmad Rahman Mawardi

item.title: Kerja Praktik Management System - ITS Surabaya
item.description: Comprehensive internship management system for Institut Teknologi Sepuluh Nopember (ITS) Surabaya, streamlining the entire internship process from application to evaluation. Built with Laravel and designed in Figma, serving three distinct user roles: students, lecturers, and administrative staff.

item.title: Real Estate in Indonesia
item.description: This a public data that extracted for educational or experiment, base on scale of PropNex.

item.title: NodeJS
item.description: Complete NodeJS development course covering JavaScript runtime fundamentals, server-side programming, Express.js framework, database integration, RESTful API development, authentication mechanisms, and modern backend architecture patterns for building scalable web applications and microservices.

item.title: Docker Platform
item.description: Comprehensive Docker platform course covering containerization fundamentals to advanced container orchestration and deployment strategies.

item.title: Laravel Framework
item.description: Comprehensive Laravel framework course covering fundamentals to advanced concepts.

item.title: PropNex Indonesia Merch Store - E-Commerce Platform
item.description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform for PropNex Indonesia merchandise, revolutionizing internal product distribution with payment gateway and JNT shipping integration. Built with Laravel, the platform facilitated cross-branch partnerships and increased merch sales by 50% after 1 month of rigorous testing.

item.title: Elasticsearch Database & ELK Stack
item.description: Study from beginner to advanced level in Elasticsearch

item.title: Git Version Control
item.description: Comprehensive Git version control course covering fundamentals to advanced repository management.

item.title: Inkelud for Kediri Gov.
item.description: Inkelud for Kediri Government is a comprehensive government dashboard website designed to streamline city data management and ensure seamless data accessibility without RTO (Recovery Time Objective) issues.

item.title: Gapih.com Landing Page
item.description: Gapih.com is a static landing page website for an API Hub payment gateway platform, serving as the primary introduction to Korea's leading payment solution connecting millions of users, financial institutions, and merchants.

item.title: Vehicle Classification and Violation Detection on Traffic Light Area using BLOB and Mean-Shift Tracking Method
item.description: This paper talk about Computer vision system was built to recognize vehicles (cars and motorcycles) and to recognize violations committed by drivers at road intersections.

item.title: PropNex Plus
item.description: PropNexPlus.com is a comprehensive real estate platform designed specifically for property agents to streamline their daily operations.

item.title: Arraya Solution - Cleaning Service Website
item.description: Arraya Solution is a comprehensive website for a cleaning service business, featuring full functionality from customer engagement to admin management. Built for UMKM with budget constraints, delivered within 1 month.

item.title: PropNex Indonesia Annual Convention - Digital Invitation Platform
item.description: An elegant single-page Laravel application for PropNex Indonesia's Annual Convention with full animations, RSVP management, and sponsorship proposal system. Delivered in 1 week with sophisticated transitions and interactive features for Singapore's leading real estate company's annual event.

item.title: PropNex Company Profile
item.description: PropNex.co.id is the official landing page for PropNex Indonesia, a leading real estate company providing comprehensive property services and solutions.

item.title: EAMS - Estate Agency Management System
item.description: EAMS (Estate Agency Management System) is the core enterprise platform maintaining PropNex Indonesia's entire business ecosystem. A comprehensive Laravel-based system managing agents, properties, transactions, commissions, and business operations for 500+ real estate professionals across multiple branches nationwide.
